name: TURGUL: RAPID FIGHTING
description: A new story fighting game awaits to be played. Turgul: Rapid Fighting will bring your fighting game experience to a whole new level.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
